actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of David Brown, Truc Nuong Brown, and Jeffrey Brown.

summary.text: Allows three named individuals, notwithstanding certain limitations on actions against the U.S. Government, to bring an action for injuries suffered by one of such individuals due to allegedly negligent surgery at an Army hospital in May 1980. Requires such action to be brought in the U.S. District Court for the District of Maryland.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of David Brown, Truc Nuong Brown, and Jeffrey Brown.
